bilingual.source: I got some good experience from working in a barber's.
bilingual.target: 我在理发店工作获得了一些很好的经验。

bilingual.source: Our teachers are well trained and have a lot of experience.
bilingual.target: 我们的老师训练有素，经验丰富。

bilingual.source: He didn't have any experience, but he was good at his job.
bilingual.target: 他没有任何经验，但他工作做得很好。

bilingual.source: To become an astronaut in China, you have to have 1,350 hours of flying experience.
bilingual.target: 在中国成为宇航员，你需要有1350小时的飞行经验。

bilingual.source: Although he is an actor who does not have much experience, he did an excellent job in the new film.
bilingual.target: 尽管他是一个没有太多经验的演员，但他在新电影中表现出色。

bilingual.source: Darren uses his experience as a college teacher to show you how to communicate well with family and friends.
bilingual.target: 达伦利用他作为大学老师的经验来教你如何与家人和朋友进行良好沟通。
你需要更多的工作经验。
你需要获得更多的经验。

bilingual.source: I am willing to share my experience.

list.abstract: experience（英[ɪkˈspɪəriəns]，美[ɪkˈspɪriəns]），英文单词，作名词为经历；感受；经验。作动词为经历；遭遇；体验。短语搭配有personal experience（个人经验）。例句为“Design is responsible for this experience.（设计负责这种体验。）” experience名词类近义词有areer，及物动词类近义词有suffer、live等。复数形式为experiences，第三人称单数为experiences，现在分词为experiencing，过去式为experienced，过去分词为experienced。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you speak from experience?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你这是自身经验吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I don't have any experience in sales.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我没有任何销售经验。

yingyinNormal.en: But don't you need experience for a job like that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那种工作难道不需要经验吗？

yingyinNormal.en: My larger concern is your experience. You have very little.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我更担心的是你缺乏经验。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, even better than money. You gained experience points.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这可比赢钱还好，你赢得了经验值。

yingyinNormal.en: Ross, that was not a near-death experience. That was barely an experience.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗斯，那不是濒死经验，就连经验都谈不上了。

yingyinNormal.en: Very good. Drawing on your own experience, I like that. Thanks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你引述亲身经验非常好。谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: Whoa, I'm calling my dad, okay? He's got experience dealing with pregnant ladies because he's an OBGYN. And experience with crazy ladies because of my mom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是打给我爸好吗？他对孕妇们的事很有经验，因为他是妇科医师，对付疯婆子也很有经验，因为有我妈。

yingyinNormal.en: No one with this little experience has ever been a real contender since Ross Perot, and at least he had the money.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗斯·佩罗之后再没有经验如此匮乏的强劲竞争者了，而且他没经验却有的是钱。

yingyinNormal.en: No. The party wants someone with experience, and so does the country.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么会，党内想要个有经验的人，人民也是。

yingyinNormal.en: Guy like Morris with experience in explosives should have known better.
yingyinNormal.zh: 像莫里斯这种有过爆破经验的人不至于这么逊。

yingyinNormal.en: I know I haven't worked in an office before, and I really don't have a lot of experience, but…
yingyinNormal.zh: 我从来没有做过办公室工作，工作经验不是很多…

yingyinNormal.en: One of them has great references and a lot of experience and then there's this guy…
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个的推荐信很棒，经验非常丰富，还有另一个家伙...

yingyinNormal.en: Because they don't know what we know. They don't have our experience and they don't have our intuition.
yingyinNormal.zh: 数据不是万能的，它们不具备我们的经验和智慧。

yingyinNormal.en: No matter the policy question, foreign or domestic, we hammer Dunbar's lack of experience.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不论是政策，国际或国内问题，我们都抨击邓巴经验不足。

yingyinNormal.en: Someone may come in with more experience than you, but they're never gonna know what you know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可能会有比你更有经验的人进来，但他们永远不会知晓你了解的一切

yingyinNormal.en: Please, sit down. Oh, okay. Do you have any experience of caregiving? I've never done it, but I'm sure I could learn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请坐。好。你有过做护理的经验吗？没有，但我肯定能学会的。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry. You're right. You have a lot more experience in this kind of thing than I do. I should follow your lead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，你说得对，关于这种事你的经验比我多得多，我应该听你的。

yingyinNormal.en: But in my experience with the universe, no matter what you do, the truth always finds a way of coming out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但根据我在宇宙中所积累的经验，不管你怎么做，真相最终会找到现身的办法。

yingyinNormal.en: I have read countless CVR transcripts of deceased pilots and I have significant accident investigation experience.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我读过无数牺牲机长的驾驶舱通话录音副本，也有相当多的事故调查经验。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 无经验的；不熟练的
adj. 有经验的；经验丰富的；熟练的；老练的

word_family.mean: n. 经历；感受；经验；给人留下印象的事

sense_info_list.en: an event or occurrence that leaves an impression on someone

examination_example.sentence: Those commuters have also <highlight>experienced</highlight> some of the worst rail strikes in years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些通勤者还经历了几年来最严重的铁路罢工。

examination_example.sentence: It's almost impossible to go through life without <highlight>experiencing</highlight> some kind of failure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人的一生几乎不可能不经历某种失败。

examination_example.sentence: It would be a mistake to think we are right now simply <highlight>experiencing</highlight> the painful side of a boom and bust cycle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果认为我们现在只是在经历一个盛衰周期的痛苦一面，那就错了。

sense_info_list.en: feel an emotion; go through mental states

examination_example.sentence: I'm <highlight>experiencing</highlight> increased zeal for working out since I no longer carry the burden of a disappointing morning weigh-in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自从我不再背负着一个令人失望的早晨称重的负担，我对健身的热情增加了。

examination_example.sentence: It was specifically to provide city dwellers with spaces for leisure where they could <highlight>experience</highlight> "a refreshing air."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它专门为城市居民提供休闲空间，他们在那里可以感受清新的空气。

examination_example.sentence: My definition revolves around the concept of "stickiness" — creations and <highlight>experiences</highlight> to which others adhere.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的定义围绕着“粘性”的概念，即创造和体验。

sense_info_list.en: the knowledge or skill acquired by experience over a period of time, especially that gained in a particular profession by someone at work

examination_example.sentence: People can contribute <highlight>experience</highlight> or information to your thinking—all the things that would make the disagreement stronger or more valid.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们可以为你的想法提供经验或信息，所有这些都会使分歧更强烈或更有效。

examination_example.sentence: But in my <highlight>experience</highlight>, using such methods to free up the odd 30 minutes doesn't work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是根据我的经验，用这样的方法来腾出剩余的30分钟是行不通的。

examination_example.sentence: Students without <highlight>experience</highlight> can catch up after a few introductory courses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有经验的学生可以在几门入门课程后迎头赶上。

word_usage.usage: experience表示（由实践得来的）经验、实践；经历、阅历的时候是不可数名词，也可以做可数名词，表示（一次）经历、体验。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 无经验的；不熟练的
adj. 有经验的；经验丰富的；熟练的；老练的

word_family.mean: n. 经历；感受；经验；给人留下印象的事

sense_info_list.en: an event or occurrence that leaves an impression on someone

examination_example.sentence: A source, who chose to remain anonymous, shared her <highlight>experience</highlight> working in a Burberry store in New York in October 2016.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位不愿透露姓名的人分享了她2016年10月在纽约一家巴宝莉门店工作的经历。

examination_example.sentence: Why does the woman describe her <highlight>experience</highlight> as far from glamorous?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么这位女士将她的经历描述的一点也不迷人？

examination_example.sentence: They have <highlight>experienced</highlight> a gradual decline since the year of 2017.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自2017年以来，他们经历了一个逐渐下降的过程。

sense_info_list.en: feel an emotion; go through mental states

examination_example.sentence: Feelings of guilt associated with emotions are more devastating and damaging than the <highlight>experience</highlight> of emotion itself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与情绪相关的负罪感比情绪体验本身更具毁灭性和破坏性。

examination_example.sentence: They will <highlight>experience</highlight> more setbacks than successes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们将经历更多的挫折而不是成功。

examination_example.sentence: It fundamentally changed our <highlight>experience</highlight> of the world, affecting the conduct of politics, religion, business, and culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它从根本上改变了我们对世界的体验，影响了政治、宗教、商业和文化的行为。

sense_info_list.en: the knowledge or skill acquired by experience over a period of time, especially that gained in a particular profession by someone at work

examination_example.sentence: It requires entrepreneurial <highlight>experience</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 需要创业经验。

examination_example.sentence: Not so much the formal variety one obtains from a university but the informal variety that comes from credible work <highlight>experience</highlight> and professional accomplishments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不是指从大学中取得的那种正式资格，而是从可信的工作经验和专业成就中获得的非正式的能力。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Experience</highlight> can rarely, unless guided by a theoretical concept, arrive at results of any great significance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除非以理论概念为指导，否则经验很少能得出具有重大意义的成果。

experience作名词，表“经验”时，为不可数名词；表“经历”解，为可数名词，其单数可指一具体活动的结果。
比赛期间运动员们互相交流经验。
误 During the competitions players exchanged experiences.
正 During the competitions players exchanged experience.

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 个人经验；个人体验；个人经历
人类体验；人类的经历；人类经验

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 凭经验的；来自经验的
adj. 有经验的；经验丰富的；熟练的；老练的

word_family.mean: n. 经历；感受；经验；给人留下印象的事

sense_info_list.en: an event or occurrence that leaves an impression on someone

examination_example.sentence: Speakers of anumeric, or numberless, languages offer a window into how the invention of numbers reshaped the human <highlight>experience</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数字或无数语言的使用者提供了一个了解数字的发明如何重塑人类体验的窗口。

examination_example.sentence: And we'd love to get some inspiration from your <highlight>experience</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们很想从您的经历中获得一些灵感。

examination_example.sentence: It's great that you have had this <highlight>experience</highlight> of teaching in Indonesia.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很高兴你在印度尼西亚有过这种教学经验。

sense_info_list.en: the knowledge or skill acquired by experience over a period of time; especially that gained in a particular profession by someone at work

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>experience</highlight> of using IT penetrates almost the entire work field.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 使用它的经验几乎渗透到整个工作领域。

examination_example.sentence: In my <highlight>experience</highlight>, being bored and alone is dangerous and can easily lead to the feeling of loneliness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以我的经验，无聊和独处是危险的，很容易带来孤独的感觉。

examination_example.sentence: The length of their driving <highlight>experience</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们驾驶经验的长度。

sense_info_list.en: feel an emotion; go through mental states

examination_example.sentence: Recognising obesity as a chronic disease with severe complications should help reduce discrimination <highlight>experienced</highlight> by many people with obesity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 视肥胖为一种伴有严重并发症的慢性病，有助于减少许多肥胖者所遭受的歧视。

examination_example.sentence: But importantly—and surprisingly—this new study suggests that the majority of students <highlight>experiencing</highlight> math anxiety have normal to high math ability.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但重要且令人惊讶的是——这项新研究表明，大多数患有数学焦虑的学生都具有正常或较高的数学能力。

examination_example.sentence: Others may <highlight>experience</highlight> a hopelessness that results in failing their core classes, such as English, science and math.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一些人可能会感到绝望，从而导致核心课程不及格，比如英语、科学和数学。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 无经验的；不熟练的
adj. 有经验的；经验丰富的；熟练的；老练的

word_family.mean: n. 经历；感受；经验；给人留下印象的事

sense_info_list.en: an event or occurrence that leaves an impression on someone

examination_example.sentence: What similar <highlight>experience</highlight> do Solio and Kisima have?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 索里奥和基西玛有什么相似的经历吗？

examination_example.sentence: To share his college <highlight>experience</highlight> with the reader.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与读者分享他的大学经历。

examination_example.sentence: You have to rely on your <highlight>experience</highlight> and on the feel of each pair as you shop.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你买鞋时必须依靠自己的经验和每双鞋的脚感。

sense_info_list.en: feel an emotion; go through mental states

examination_example.sentence: For the first time in years my brother <highlight>experienced</highlight> quiet when I got home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我回到家时，我哥哥多年来第一次感到安静。

examination_example.sentence: People don't just want material things anymore, they want to <highlight>experience</highlight> life—the arts are a perfect crossover (交迭) between culture and commerce.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们不再只是想要物质上的东西，他们想要体验生活——艺术是文化和商业之间完美的交迭。

examination_example.sentence: Nurses need to be aware of the possible meanings of silence when they come across the personal anxiety their patients may be <highlight>experiencing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当护士发现病人可能处于个人焦虑时，他们需要意识到，沉默可能代表的含义。

sense_info_list.en: the knowledge or skill acquired by experience over a period of time, especially that gained in a particular profession by someone at work

examination_example.sentence: have international work <highlight>experience</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有国际工作经验

examination_example.sentence: It is because more life <highlight>experience</highlight> may help people better identify priorities in life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是因为更多的生活经验可能会帮助人们更好地确定生活中的优先事项。

examination_example.sentence: Simon is a comedian and actor who has 10 years' <highlight>experience</highlight> of teaching comedy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 西蒙是一名喜剧演员和演员，他有10年的喜剧教学经验。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 无经验的；不熟练的
adj. 有经验的；经验丰富的；熟练的；老练的

word_family.mean: n. 经历；感受；经验；给人留下印象的事

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 丰富的经历；经验丰富；丰富的体验
类似经验；类似经历；类似体验
志愿者经历；志愿者经验
实践经验；亲身经验；亲身体验

sense_info_list.en: an event or occurrence that leaves an impression on someone

examination_example.sentence: Thinking back what I've <highlight>experienced</highlight>, I took some time to write myself some advice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 回想我的经历，我花了一些时间给自己写了一些建议。

examination_example.sentence: Being fully immersed (沉浸) in a French-speaking environment was a valuable learning <highlight>experience</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 完全沉浸在讲法语的环境中是一次宝贵的学习经历。

examination_example.sentence: People with health problems try to share their <highlight>experience</highlight> with others online.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有健康问题的人试图在网上与他人分享他们的经历。

sense_info_list.en: feel an emotion; go through mental states

examination_example.sentence: Lots of young people have never <highlight>experienced</highlight> home-life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多年轻人从未体验过家庭生活。

examination_example.sentence: They love this feeling and want to <highlight>experience</highlight> it as often as possible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们喜欢这种感觉，并希望尽可能多地体验这种感觉。

examination_example.sentence: It's possible for us to slow down time by expanding our <highlight>experience</highlight> of time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们有可能通过扩展我们的时间体验来放慢时间。

sense_info_list.en: the knowledge or skill acquired by experience over a period of time, especially that gained in a particular profession by someone at work

examination_example.sentence: So, many teenagers are getting <highlight>experience</highlight> working part-time, dealing with banks and deciding whether to save or spend their money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，许多青少年正在获得兼职工作、与银行打交道以及决定是存钱还是花钱的相关经验。

examination_example.sentence: My <highlight>experience</highlight> in China shows these efforts are useful and effective, which finally removed people's fear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我在中国的经验表明，这些努力是有用及有效的，最终消除了人们的恐惧。

examination_example.sentence: With increased skills and <highlight>experience</highlight>, the people learnt how to make the boats stronger against rains and storms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着技能和经验的增加，人们学会了如何使船只更坚固，以抵御风雨。

word_usage.usage:
experience作名词，表“经验”时，为不可数名词；表“经历”解，为可数名词，其单数可指一具体活动的结果。
比赛期间运动员们互相交流经验。
误 During the competitions players exchanged experiences.
正 During the competitions players exchanged experience.
